titleInfo.title: Marty Robbins, Don Winters, and Bobby Sykes at Winston Academy Gym Poster Layout (16344)

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet layout (red and black on white) announcing Marty Robbins, Don Winters, and Bobby Sykes in the Winston Academy Gym on May 10. Poster features metal photoplates of the stars. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/41105/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
